Guns fly off local shelves

New England gun manufacturers and retailers are trying to keep up with increasing demand as buyers snap up firearms in anticipation of new rules. (Globe)

GOP officials close to Scott Brown report that the former Republican senator is "leaning strongly toward running" in the upcoming special Massachusetts election to replace US Senator John Kerry. (AP)
